amendment.description: To revise the inaccessible component rule for children's products.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4128 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4128 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Klobuchar. (consideration: CR S1693-1696; text: CR S1695) To revise the inaccessible component rule for children's products.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4128 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4128 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Klobuchar.
